Name: Apple & Cranberry Pie
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. FLOAT lightly whipped cream on the cocktail's surface by pouring over the back of a spoon.
Review: Sip apple and cranberry through a creamy cinnamon layer.
History: Created in 2003 by yours truly, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Apple & Cranberry Pie contains 214 calories
